selec_unidad: [cyan]Temperature unit[/cyan] ([bold yellow]C[/bold yellow] for [yellow]Celsius[/yellow], [bold green]F[/bold green] for [green]Fahrenheit[/green])
menu:
-----------MENU-----------
 1- Current forecast 
 2- Extended forecast 
 3- Query history
 4- Settings 
 5- Exit
entrada_no_validad: [bold red]⚠️  Invalid input. Please try again.[/bold red]
otra_consulta: Would you like to make another query? (YES/NO)
seguro_salir: Are you sure you want to exit? (YES/NO):
opcion_no: Invalid option. Please select again between 1 and 5.
opciones_medidas:
a- Celsius
b- Fahrenheit
c- Back
error_medidas: Invalid option. Please select again a - b - c.
opciones_historial:
a- Daily
b- Extended
c- Back
error_historial: Invalid option. Please select again a - b - c.
opciones_configuracion:
a- Change unit of measure
b- Change language
c- Clear Daily history
d- Clear Extended history
e- Back
seguro_historial: Are you sure you want to delete the history? (YES/NO)
seguro_extendido: Are you sure you want to delete the extended history? (YES/NO)
error_configuracion: Invalid option. Please select again a - b.
